Name: Quarter Deck
Ingredients: 60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
30 ml Lustau San Emilio Pedro Ximénez Sherry
10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: With flavours of prune, toffee, and maple syrup this is a complex after-dinner cocktail.
Nutrition: One serving of Quarter Deck contains 162 calories
